title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Utilizing Facebook-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience using social networking services (SNS)
context.additional_context: Language learning program combining asynchronous interaction via Facebook group features in BYOD environments with in-class practical activities

learning_goals: Learners can articulate their opinions accurately at least twice weekly in Facebook group discussions.
Learners achieve collaborative problem-solving skills with peers at over 80% proficiency through blended learning activities.
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in language proficiency assessment by the end of the 6-month course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
